long_desc:
Combination Wrenches are used for loosening and tightening nuts and bolts.


Product Features



  • Open end angled 15-degree to flip and re-engage in tight spaces

  • 12-point box end 15-degree offset to create clearance for fingers

  • Chrome vanadium steel forging for durability

  • Oval body for a more comfortable grip

  • Satin finish provides anti-corrosion protection and slip resistant grip


Technical Data



  • Spanner Type: Combination Spanner

  • Size System: Metric

  • Size: 19 mm

  • Material: Chrome Vanadium Steel

  • Finish: Chrome Satin
